%preamble='\\def\\r{1}\n\\def\\n{6}\n\\newcommand{\\medial}{\n\\draw circle (\\r);\n\\foreach\\i in{1,...,\\n}\n\t{\n\t\\pgfmathsetmacro{\\j}{-90-360/\\n*(\\i-1)}\n\t\\fill (\\j:-\\r) circle (2pt) node [anchor=\\j] {$\\i$};\n\t\\coordinate (\\i) at (\\j:-\\r);\n\t}\n}',nodescale='1',scale='1',line_options=line_options,northsouth=True,lowsuffix='.north',highsuffix='.south',labels=True,ptsize='2pt',height=4,width=3,loc_x=loc_x,loc_y=loc_y,nodeLabel=nodeLabel,nodeName=nodeName,node_options=node_options,indices_for_nodes=False,jiggle=0,jiggle_x=0,jiggle_y=0,standalone=True,padding=1,nodeDraw=nodeDraw,nodeTikz=nodeTikz,offset=1,color='black',landscape=False
\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{tikz}
\def\r{1}
\def\n{6}
\newcommand{\medial}{
\draw circle (\r);
\foreach\i in{1,...,\n}
	{
	\pgfmathsetmacro{\j}{-90-360/\n*(\i-1)}
	\fill (\j:-\r) circle (2pt) node [anchor=\j] {$\i$};
	\coordinate (\i) at (\j:-\r);
	}
}
\usepackage[psfixbb,graphics,tightpage,active]{preview}
\PreviewEnvironment{tikzpicture}
\usepackage[margin=0in]{geometry}
\begin{document}
\pagestyle{empty}
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1]
\node[](123)at(0,0.0)
{\scalebox{1}{123}};

\node[](213)at(-1.5,1.3333333333333333)
{\scalebox{1}{213}};

\node[](132)at(1.5,1.3333333333333333)
{\scalebox{1}{132}};

\node[](312)at(-1.5,2.6666666666666665)
{\scalebox{1}{312}};

\node[](231)at(1.5,2.6666666666666665)
{\scalebox{1}{231}};

\node[](321)at(0,4.0)
{\scalebox{1}{321}};

\draw(123.north)--(213.south);
\draw(123.north)--(132.south);
\draw(213.north)--(312.south);
\draw(213.north)--(231.south);
\draw(132.north)--(312.south);
\draw(132.north)--(231.south);
\draw(312.north)--(321.south);
\draw(231.north)--(321.south);
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
